trans-unit.source: Enables <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls or other server controls to contain collections of verbs.
trans-unit.target: 수 있도록 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> 컨트롤 또는 다른 서버 컨트롤을 동사 컬렉션을 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A verb in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls is an action that a user can carry out in the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 동사 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>컨트롤 사용자가 사용자 인터페이스 (UI)에서 수행할 수 있는 작업입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a verb is represented in the UI by a clickable control such as a button, a link, or a menu item.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 동사는 클릭할 수 있는 컨트롤 단추, 링크 또는 메뉴 항목으로 UI에 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set provides standard verbs that are available by default to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and other server controls (such as custom, ASP.NET, and user controls) that can act like <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls when placed in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones.
trans-unit.target: 웹 파트 컨트롤 집합을 제공 하도록 기본적으로 사용할 수 있는 표준 동사 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>컨트롤 및 기타 서버 컨트롤 (예: 사용자 지정, ASP.NET 및 사용자 컨트롤) 처럼 작동할 수 있는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>배치 되 면 제어 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>영역.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Standard verbs include close, minimize, restore, delete, edit, and export.
trans-unit.target: 표준 동사 닫기 포함, 최소화, 복원, 삭제, 편집 및 내보내기.

trans-unit.source: You can also create custom verbs for use with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> and server controls.
trans-unit.target: 와 함께 사용할 사용자 지정 동사를 만들 수도 있습니다 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>서버 컨트롤과.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The IWebActionable interface, with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> property, gives you a way to integrate custom verbs into your controls.
trans-unit.target: IWebActionable 인터페이스와 해당 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>속성, 컨트롤에 사용자 지정 동사를 통합 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class implements the IWebActionable interface and implements its single property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>클래스 IWebActionable 인터페이스를 구현 하 고 해당 단일 속성을 구현 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: To add custom verbs to a control that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class, you must override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, add custom verbs to a collection, and return the collection.
trans-unit.target: 상속 하는 컨트롤에 사용자 지정 동사를 추가 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>재정의 해야 클래스는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성을 사용자 지정 동사 컬렉션에 추가 하 고 컬렉션을 반환 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The collection referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property contains only custom verbs; standard verbs are not included in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 참조 하는 컬렉션의 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>만 사용자 지정 동사를 포함 하는 속성, 표준 동사가이 컬렉션에 포함 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The default return value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is `null`, because by default there are no custom verbs in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 값을 반환 하는 기본은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성에는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>컨트롤은 `null`있기 때문에 기본적으로 사용자 지정 동사가 없는 컬렉션에서.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Adding custom verbs to server controls that are not <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls requires one extra step.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 동사 없는 서버 컨트롤에 추가 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>컨트롤 한 단계가 더 필요 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: In those cases, the controls must also implement the IWebActionable interface and implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 경우 컨트롤은 또한 IWebActionable 인터페이스를 구현 하 고 구현 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: After you have added custom verbs to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A> collection, the Web Parts control set automatically handles the other steps necessary to create and render the custom verbs.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 동사를 추가한 후에 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>자동으로 설정 하는 웹 파트 컨트롤 컬렉션을 만들고 사용자 지정 동사를 렌더링 하는 데 필요한 기타 단계를 처리 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of custom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 컬렉션에 대 한 참조 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The Verbs property references a collection of custom verbs (if any) that are added to a verbs menu in the header of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control.
trans-unit.target: Verbs 속성 참조 사용자 지정 동사 컬렉션입니다 (있는 경우)의 헤더에 동사 메뉴에 추가 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>또는 기타 서버 컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The Verbs collection does not contain references to the standard <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> objects provided with the Web Parts control set, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 동사 컬렉션에 포함 된 표준에 대 한 참조가 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>웹 파트 컨트롤에 제공 하는 개체와 같은 설정 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A>, 또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>

trans-unit.source: Developers who want to add custom verbs to a custom control that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class can simply override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> property that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class implements.
trans-unit.target: 파생 하는 컨트롤을 사용자 지정에 사용자 지정 동사를 추가 하려는 개발자는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>클래스 재정의 하기만 하면는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A>속성 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>클래스 구현.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Developers who want to add custom verbs to a user control, or a custom control that is not a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> interface by providing an implementation of the Verbs property.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 정의 컨트롤 또는 하지 않은 사용자 지정 컨트롤에 사용자 지정 동사를 추가 하려는 개발자는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>컨트롤을 구현 해야 합니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable>Verbs 속성의 구현을 제공 하 여 인터페이스.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebActionable> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection"></xref> that contains custom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection"> </xref> 사용자 지정을 포함 하는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> 개체입니다.
